name: Garlic Twice Baked Potatoes
steps: Bake without foil at 350 for 1-­‐1 1/2 hours. Slice long ways in half and scoop out middle into a large bowl. Add:
Add all together and then add milk. Spoon in the mixed potatoes into skins. Top with cheese and parsley.
Put back in oven broil -­‐ but watch carefully or bake 15 min. more at 350.
